Address: 54 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Quality Bay Views!
This 3 bedroom home is available to the astute purchaser looking to invest in the area. Potential for capital growth guaranteed. This home is well presented with spacious open plan living which opens onto rear deck & offering quality views of the bay toward Geelong. A perfect spot to enjoy a family BBQ or just some time out relaxing. There is also a second living room. All 3 bedrooms have robes & the central bathroom has access to the master. Central gas heating, air conditioner, excellent storage, single garage with drive through access to the back yard are a few features of this very tidy property.

Description:
A LIFESTYLE PROPERTY (784 SQM) WALK TO THE JETTY THROUGH PARKLANDS.
Backing on to a reserve, this much loved home has all you would want, size, privacy, lush gardens and plenty of space. Big double doors open to large entrance, through to formal lounge room, separate dining, open plan living with informal meals, all living is light and bright. Four bedrooms, the master has ensuite, all bedrooms have BIR's, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features include timber ceilings, central heating, split system, wood fire, fans, pantry and loads of storage. The matured garden along with the outside entertainment area, as well as the natural light, provide a perfect lifestyle. Double garage, big workshop, vegetable patch with fruit trees, utility yard and plenty of off road parking. You must inspect to appreciate all that is here, space, position, privacy and so much more.

Description:
Immaculate Family Home on a Fantastic Block
Located in the ever popular Yarramundi Drive, only a short walk from the boat ramp, golf club, schools and public transport sits this extremely well thought-out and solid family home.
This home looks brand new - a real testament to the vendors who have meticulously maintained the property in their much enjoyed time in this home. With plenty of space for the whole family, this home comprises four great sized bedrooms with built-in robes, two generous living zones, a nice big kitchen with stainless steel appliances and storage aplenty, double lock up garage, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, a large undercover entertainment area and a very generous backyard for the kids.
We really could go on all day listing the great points about this property, but the only way to really know is to come along to an inspection and 'feel' it. They certainly don't build them like this anymore...
Insights: 41 Yarramundi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Smart Renovation ! Great Location !
Take the stress out of your next purchase. Whether its downsizing to a lovely established street with a manageable-sized home that is low maintenance and looks a treat or your first home where the block size is 750m2 and there is room to expand at a later date then this property has it all. Three bedrooms with BIRs and one bathroom and so much more. Modern appliances and decor all tastefully renovated. The hub of the home is located at the front of the property with a second living or activity area adjacent to the kitchen which flows out to an outdoor entertaining space. The bedrooms, bathroom and laundry are all located to the rear of the home in close proximity.
Outdoors a double colourbond garage is currently under construction with council plans approved. The block is neatly divided into workable areas leaving room for a vegetable garden or play area at the rear of the garage.
Situated on the edge of Drysdale - Clifton Springs this home is central to schools, shopping, public transport, recreational pursuits and the Bellarine's best cafes. The market is moving so do not delay in organising an inspection now.
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 25 Bullimah Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Potentially Stunning Bay Views!
This block of approximately 585m2 will give the fortunate purchaser the opportunity to gain stunning bay views across the bay toward Geelong and surrounds. Situated in an elevated and established area of Clifton Springs this allotment is fully fenced and secured. Clifton Springs is located within the booming Bellarine Peninsula and a parcel of land here is a sound investment. Whether it is for the future or to build a family home for today this parcel of land will do well by the astute purchaser. With 15m frontage and all services available.

Description:
SO AFFORDABLE, GREAT POSITION , BAY VIEWS AND SOLAR PANELS

So close to the waters edge, Golf Club and leisure walks.......a fabulous opportunity.

Description:
Sunlight, Space and Character
Located in a quiet residential neighbourhood among other quality homes this five bedroom property has everything you could ask for. The allotment of 1089sqm approx. that surrounds the property delivers impressive depth and the asset of north facing living ensures a light filled home.
Sitting privately behind a high front gate and offering security, this single level residence is designed with timeless features, a beautiful private garden and a faultless floor plan.
Enter the home to a spacious sunken formal living room, and formal dining with vaulted ceilings and full length windows out on to a lush fern filled garden & courtyard. Adjacent to the entrance is a dedicated study and Master bedroom complete with WIR and ensuite.
The generous dimensions of this family home are further evident as you move through to the open plan kitchen with blackwood timber cabinets and granite bench tops. Through double doors into the informal living room complete with built in wet bar.
Beyond the family room are three more bedrooms all with BIR?s, a central bathroom, and laundry.
North facing sliding doors and full length windows from each room spill out to the covered lush fern garden and a large deck and garden zone. Ideal for entertaining family and friends.
Conveniently close to Boat Harbour and golf club, plus all that the Bellarine has to offer, this four car garage brick home is ready to enjoy now, with the scope to further update.
Insights: 7 Bungalalli Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Serenity at a Court End
Boasting courtend placement, this delightful four bedroom home sits on a leafy block with northfacing rear garden providing many private nooks for quiet contemplation. The design is lightfilled and architecturally interesting. The sunken lounge sits on hardwood floors under a soaring ceiling with triple aspect that brings the garden vistas in. This delightful room features a thrifty Rinnai gas heater and split system air conditioner. The bright kitchen/meals area adjoins a northfacing entertaining patio complete with builtin BBQ and rangehood. Nestled by gardens, this lovely indoor-outdoor space is truly the home’s hub and the comfort factor is high with a large gas log fire. The kitchen features gas cooktop, electric oven and grill, LG dishwasher and good benchspace. Above the dining zone discover nifty attic storage with a dropdown ladder. Set at the facade with large picture window, the master bedroom takes in the tranquility of the court end. Parents will love the walkin robe and convenient en suite shower room. The minor bedroom wing includes a tidy bathroom, toilet and laundry with yard access. These bedrooms feature builtin robes and idyllic garden views. Outdoors, a fenced utility space features a garden shed and is ideal for pets or a vegetable garden. There’s a spacious carport as well as parking on the driveway for 3 cars or ‘toys’. A water tank supports the garden. The location is ideal for families. Children can play safely on the court and ride their bikes to school. Close to major supermarkets in Drysdale, bay beaches, boat ramp and golf course.
Insights: 5 Gaddang Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet Court Location With Views!
Lovely parcel of vacant land in a great location awaits the imagination of a savvy purchaser looking to 'capture a view and live the coastal dream'. With bay views on offer and set within a quiet court location, this block of land should be on every buyers short list. A generous block size of approximately 585m2 and perfectly positioned on the high side of the court to enhance the impressive outlook.
It's a simple equation, 'quality' vacant blocks within established pockets of Clifton Springs (with views) are becoming scarce and now is the time to act. Buy now and build tomorrow or for the investment savvy buy now and watch your investment grow.

Description:
A GREAT STARTER OR INVESTMENT, WALK TO THE JETTY, SCHOOLS AND CLUBS.
You will not make a better purchase at this affordable price, ready to live in now and take your time to add or update when you wish. Some water views, front verandah, separate entrance through to generous lounge room with adjacent meals and kitchen, both living spaces have abundant natural light. Three bedrooms all with BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and big laundry. This home features new window furnishings, fan forced gas fire, air conditioner, pantry, new lights and new guttering/downpipes. Leafy and matured gardens with fernery....a delightful feel. Freestanding double garage, shed and side drive for more vehicles. The position is excellent with parklands and convenience stores nearby and you can have that quick summer swim before dinner.....a great buy.

Description:
Extensive family home, scenic bayside position
'Edge Water' says it all! Set on high ground beside the opalescent waters of Corio Bay, this expansive family home is graced with intoxicating views of Corio Bay and You Yangs and is one of the few homes within 200m of the newly developed bay beach.
Bathed in natural light from morning to night, the 2-storey floorplan is cleverly zoned to accommodate friends and family privately. The lower level is self-contained with formal, informal and alfresco living zones, 2 bedrooms (one with en suite), a family bathroom, powder room, laundry (with drying room) and 3-car garage. The upper level boasts another large living space, 2 bedrooms, an office and bathroom. Lower level living maximises the breathtaking water scenes. The kitchen sits between formal and informal living with the most magnificent bay and You Yangs vista. Well-kept appliances include double electric ovens, gas cooktop and dishwasher. The walk-in pantry is fitting in this family-sized home. No chore is to great in this scenic kitchen!
Informal living flows to a covered north-facing alfresco space ideal for year round entertaining and everyday family life. This indoor-outdoor space also features a built-in bar for easy entertaining. On the other side of the kitchen, formal living is proportioned for dining and relaxation. Corner north-west glazing frames exquisite views and the built-in buffet is a quality bonus. Both living zones flow to the covered front patio amplifying the delightful coastal atmosphere and bringing you closer to the views.
Upstairs the bay panorama is further showcased! The large living zone extends to a lofty balcony - the perfect spot for sunworshippers and boat spotters! Two bedrooms, an office and a spacious bathroom bud of this superb living area. A concealed wet bar allows convenient catering on this semi self-contained upper level.
Three of the 4 bedrooms are graced with relaxing bay views, and all bedrooms offer built-in or walk-in robes. Zoned ducted gas heating and refrigerated AC allows climate personalisation in all corners of the home. Tinted windows enhance privacy, and quality window furnishings indoor and out have great thermal benefit. Excellent storage includes 2 large storerooms and spacious cabinetry in the wet areas.
The yard space is low maintenance and includes a utility courtyard with clothesline, raised vegetable beds and a 3500L water tank. The gardens are automatically irrigated. Whatever the weather, there are many serene outdoor nooks for quiet contemplation.
The lifestyle here is another enviable asset. Walk to the Dell, boat ramp and golf course. Explore the excellent fishing and swimming spots within metres of your front door. Schools, kindergartens and a variety of shopping facilities are all just a stone's throw away.
Enjoy an inspection at this immaculately presented home. Imagine these sensational views as the backdrop to your family's life!
- Expansive home with bay frontage and intoxicating views of Corio Bay and You Yangs
- 4BRs, 3 living zones, scenic kitchen, alfresco living, office, 3 bathrooms and 3-car garage
- Cleverly designed, with zoned climate control, to accommodate friends and family privately
- Informal and formal living below all with exquisite panoramas over opalescent bay waters
- Master with en suite, 3 out of 4 BRs with water views, all BRs with robes
- 200m to bay beaches, walk to boat ramp, golf course, fishing and swimming spots
Insights: 31 Edgewater Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 125 Clifton Springs Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
OPEN, LIGHT, SPACIOUS AND PEACEFUL
Put your foot inside this front door and feel how light, open and spacious this lovely home is. Large windows bring the outside in and help you feel that you can unwind and relax. Imagine sitting on the couch feeling warm and cosy in front of the wood heater that very efficiently heats the living area through to the kitchen and downstairs bedrooms.
The hub of every home is the kitchen and this home is no different. The living room overlooks a manicured garden, then extend your vision to a rural view. Quiet and peaceful is how I would describe this home.
Upstairs is a large second living area with dormer windows again it is open, light and spacious. Main bedroom with Ensuite and WIR. The rear veranda has been built in and is currently used as a bedroom but the options abound for this area. The current Vendor has previously used it as a studio, feel free to use your imagination on how you would use this space. Large garage workshop completes this package. The Bellarine Peninsula has a lot to offer. Especially the suburb of Clifton Springs. My family and I moved here to give our kids the opportunity to enjoy country living without missing out on the daily things required to survive. Balance is what it is all about here. Work, live and play in a space that has all you need. Daily requirements such as Schools, Medical Centres and shopping precinct. Balanced with restaurants, cafes, walking tracks, sporting groups, golf, fishing. What is your bent? I am sure you will find this place will amaze you and tick many of your sea/tree change list. Why don't you write a pros and cons list after you have inspected this calming home.
Insights: 125 Clifton Springs Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle Starter Property
Inspect this great first home or investment property with fantastic position and a peaceful creekside elevated outlook.
You are welcomed by the oversize front door into a warm family living area which flows to the open plan kitchen/dining - tastefully modernised, light and bright. The expansive lounge room window takes advantage of the beautiful treed outlook. Ultra-modern kitchen has been renovated with plenty of cabinetry and oversize oven. Sliding doors from the dining area open out to a magnificent outdoor entertaining area with built in kitchen and spa - perfect for year round entertaining!
The three bedrooms and family bathroom are neatly tucked away in a separate wing of the home. Main bedroom with built-in robe and ensuite. Double carport with plenty of room on the opposite side of the block for parking the van or boat. Rear backyard with two storage sheds and securely fenced.
So well located, close to public transport, Clifton Springs Golf Club, schooling, sporting facilities and only 25 minutes to Geelong.
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609

Description:
True BLUE Water Views!
Without doubt the feature that sets this property apart from its peers is the stunning open plan design. Floor to ceiling windows perfectly frame the outstanding panoramic water views. A fully renovated kitchen offers both stylish finishes and clever storage solutions with its oversized timber island bench top and feature industrial style light fittings. A spacious family friendly backyard is perfectly orientated to take in the afternoon sun. A paved entertaining area with dual shade sails offers further lifestyle comforts. A double lock up garage, single carport and ample off street parking caters for the car, boat and caravan. For those buyers wanting an opportunity to significantly value add to a property, may I suggest "going up" to capture even more impressive views (STCA), or, the no brainer is to extend off the front with a decked entertaining area (STCA).

Description:
Stop To Smell The Flowers!
Property such as this family home, that has been so lovingly cared for, is sure to attract plenty of interest so be sure you make the time to inspect before it's snapped up by another astute buyer. Offering superb presentation this 3 bedroom plus study home is ready for the new owners to move in and enjoy. With formal lounge plus dining room and a separate family room there is plenty of space for many a happy family gathering. The kitchen overlooks lovely gardens and the chef of the family will find there are loads of cupboard space to fill. There is an adjoining meals area with doors that lead out to the undercover outdoor living zone. All bedrooms are generously sized, have robes and there is an ensuite to the master. Central gas heating and reverse cycle split system cover the climate control all year round. Slim line water tank, work shop, double carport and delightful gardens make this home a very appealing package indeed. Inspect today

Description:
Low Maintenance Lifestyle by the Bay!
So much to offer!!
This neat home set into a lovely quiet street located just a short distance from the stunning bay promotes a low maintenance lifestyle that's too good to pass up, ideal for a lock up and leave holiday home with very little up keep! With so much potential to add value through renovation homes like these don't last long!
The home holds 3 bedrooms all completed with BIRs, an open plan living space that flows to an outdoor entertaining area that's perfect for a summer night BBQ. Outside you will find 2 garden sheds and a very tidy, peaceful private sitting area at the front of the property for relaxation.
Just down the road you have all the local amenities of Clifton Springs, also close by is the Town Centre of Drysdale which has fantastic sporting clubs, boutique shops and schools.
Public transport is located at the Clifton Springs central hub that can easily take you to Geelong and links to Melbourne or Great Ocean Road are provided.
We look forward to seeing you at this lovely property!

As Rare As Hen's Teeth

Comprising three bedrooms all with built-in robes, gas heating, split system cooling, spacious central neat and tidy bathroom with shower and separate bath and kitchen with stainless steel appliances and plenty of storage. Outside you'll find the home is positioned to maximise the yard space on this corner allotment, and includes a decked undercover entertainment area and a large garden shed. Situated close to Clifton Springs primary school, public transport, and the new Curlewis shopping centre; this property represents amazing value for money. Contact me to arrange a viewing!

Description:
So Many Options
Let's start by talking about what you would get if you choose to live here in Clifton Springs. A suburb where all desires for a good life exist such as the necessary amenities like shopping, medical, schools and transport. Added to this are the options to have a relaxing lifestyle. Walking trails, restaurants, cafes, sporting groups, dance groups and Bellarine Railway steam train rides just to name a few. This lovely home is close to all these things that give you a place to work, live and play. This lovely home is ideal for investment, first home, downsizers or families. The floorplan is open plan with main bedroom at the front and two others with built in robes at the rear. Positioning of the home on the land has left a good sized rear space for the kids or the dog. Currently tenanted so we require a minimum of 24 hour's notice to inspect. Must not forget to let you know that there are views from the front living and main bedroom.

Description:
Land in Quiet Established Street
Substantial blocks of land in an established neighbourhood are often hard to find these days. Look no further this may be just the block you are seeking. Sloping from north to south the block has the possibility of views from the rear with a spacious North facing back yard. The substantial size gives plenty of options for the placement of your new home.
Located close to public transport and just down the road from the Clifton Springs boat ramp. There are a variety of schools locally, all necessary amenities and a large array of cafes and restaurants. Fifteen minutes from the surf or ten minutes from the Bay for a spot of fishing.
730m2
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 23 Bullimah Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016.
